title: Vienna Bargain
description: She betrayed him, and now she has no choice but to accept his bargain. Prison…or three weeks with him at his secluded villa.Three weeks not just as his sub, but as his BDSM slave. She’s totally at the mercy of a man whose touch is so intense she broke her own rules: she slept with him, and worse, she let her emotions get involved.Can she keep her secrets when his touch, and her own traitorous heart, make her want to give in and fall in love?
author: Lila Dubois
